page.title: 13BARNARD CASTLE ART TREASURES
page.content: The most famous single exhibit in the Bowes Museum is the clockwork silver swan.The museum has however the largest collection of famous painting outside London's National Gallery and the most French and Spanish paintings in England.A newly bought item is a fabulous French writing desk decorated with Sevres plates. The Friends of the Bowes Museum help to buy new items and there is a club for children called the Junior Friends which meets in the holidays. The museum's most important patron is the Queen Mother,Elizabeth Bowes Lyon,who is a descendant of John Bowes.Her last visit to the museum was in 1981.The museum stages regular exhibitions and has been called the Taj Mahal of the north-east.
